item.description:
NOTE: NEW LOCATION HAS BEEN FINALIZED; WE'LL BE UPSTAIRS AT DURTY NELLY'S (108 Blackstone, Boston, MA 02109)

Massachusetts Introductory Meetup

A representative from the official campaign will be joining us! He is expected to provide details on how Massachusetts supporters can help Ron Paul in nearby New Hampshire. His presentation will be followed by an informal discussion of local planning, including a Ron Paul Pub Crawl, sign waves, outreach to independents and the anti-war community Yard signs and bumper stickers will be available! http://www.facebook.c...
item.name: Massachusetts Introductory Meetup
